text: Fabio Biondi (born 15 March 1961) is an Italian violinist and conductor. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * Robert & Clara Schumann: 2 Sonatas for Violin & Piano; 3 Romances, Op. 22 (1993) ==References== Category:Italian violinists Category:Classical violinists Category:Living people Category:1961 births
title: Fabio Biondi
